attributes.action: Allow politics students to study the ideology they chose.
attributes.additional_details: This goes against the British value of democracy and it will lead us to totalitarianism and a rejection of democracy. Feminism reviewed the least amount of votes and was rejected by almost everyone in the class.
attributes.background: Within class we used an alternative voting system (STV) to democratically decide which ideology we were going to study in class-Anarchism won with a profound majority. Due to our current politics teacher leaving we are being forced to study the ideology chosen by the previous year- feminism.

rejection.details: This is a decision for your school and not the UK Government or Parliament.
